comments.body: More of just a curiosity, but I've always meant to ask about the `symbolPrfixes` in the `PresentationCompilerConfig` interface. I know I don't actually expose this in `coc-metals`, and it looks like we don't in the VS Code extension either. Is this intentional or just an oversight that you originally never used this in the VS Code extension?
I don't think this feature was used too much at any point, it has been implemented early with the other completion features by @olafurpg , but not sure what was the intention.
